thoughts.text: The 'google' command returned some links to websites that have reviews of Qalam wa Lawh language school. I should use the 'browse_website' command to visit each website and read the reviews.
thoughts.reasoning: Visiting each website and reading the reviews will help me get a better idea of the quality of education and services offered by the school.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to visit each website and read the reviews
- Compare the reviews and decide on the quality of education and services offered by the school
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am reading reviews from reputable sources and taking them with a grain of salt.
